description:
Komugi is an energetic and slightly clumsy second year middle school student living in Shitamachi City. She and her classmate Kokona work as idols, but compared to the explosively popular Kokona, Komugi only manages to find dull jobs. Despite this, she continues to enjoy working as an idol while attending middle school. One day, an injured mysterious creature known as Usa-P appears before her. When Komugi administers first aid, Usa-P is impressed by her kindness and asks Komugi to become a legendary girl...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Birth of the Magical Nurse!
まじかるナース, 誕生!
